title: John Gielgud's Letters   (BBC 2004)
description:
John Gielgud - Gielgud's Letters


The remarkable life of one the great actors of stage and screen is told through John Gielgud's own colourful correspondences through the decades.

Read by Derek Jacobi.

Episode 1: Mon 12 Apr 2004 (1/5)
Actor Sir John Gielgud's remarkable life told through his letters. In 1936, he was Hamlet in New York.


Episode 2: Tue 13 Apr 2004 (2/5)
In 1952, John Gielgud travelled to Hollywood to star in Julius Caesar.


Episode 3: Wed 14 Apr 2004 (3/5)
In 1959, actor John Gielgud faced the threat of blackmail over his homosexuality.

Episode 4: Thu 15 Apr 2004 (4/5)
In 1970, Gielgud contemplates taking a part in an exciting new play at London's Royal Court Theatre.


Episode 5: Fri 16 Apr 2004 (5/5)
Now in his 70s, Gielgud appears in a film called Arthur. He continues to act well into his 90s.


Enjoy and Seed!!
